```{r}
getwd()
```


```{r}
nucseq <-
  nucseq%>%
  mutate(Protein= tolower(Protein))
nucseq
```

```{r}
Protein_length <- nucseq%>%
  select(Protein, Length)%>%
  group_by(Protein)%>%
  summarise(Longest_Proteins= max(Length), Count= table(names(Protein)))%>%
  arrange(desc(Longest_Proteins))
Protein_length
```
